attributes.action: Allow ALL Gurka Soldiers and their families serving or veterans to settle in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gurka Soldiers have served with the British Army in peace time and in conflicts.Many have lost their lives or been disabled leaving families no choice other then to return to a poor standard of living back in their home country. At the moment veterans have no right to settle in the UK

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
